title: Random Leaver Buster
body: I was playing with my friends in league of legends, after the game ended it says you have a leaver buster when i was playing the entire game. For no reason now i have a leaver buster that i don't wish to wait out. So is there any way that the leaver buster can be removed?

replies.body:
I looked into this for you and I can see you've recently had a trend of disconnecting from matches. If you were marked as AFK in the match you're inquiring about, you wouldn't have received low priority queues for just this match, it would be for the trend of disconnections that's been going on. 

Because disconnections negatively affect everyone in the match, regardless of intent, the system treats all leaves equally. This is one of the key reasons why leaverbuster penalties cannot be removed or modified in any way. If you're experiencing technical issues that are causing you to disconnect from games, please let me know and we can work on troubleshooting the root cause. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

I never went afk for the entire match nor was i prompted a warning for the leaver buster i had internet problems only once for at most 10 seconds i didn't even go back to base before i rejoined would those 10 seconds really count?

If you were prompted by LeaverBuster's message it means you were afk or disconnected for a portion of the match. 

[Don’t be a leaver. Don’t get busted.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)
